name: Soapstone GEEKSOAP
description:
There's no place like home... and now you can bubble and hearth your way out of dirty, sticky situations with the Soapstone!

This fantastic handcarved soap is lovingly handmade one-at-a-time from all natural and vegan friendly ingredients. No two Soapstones are ever exactly alike, though all are intentionally designed to look realistically like roughly carved stone. 

Each Soapstone bar emits a fresh & tropical coconut lime verbena fragrance that'll bring the lush, clear water beaches of Stranglethorn Vale right to your shower, without the hassle of pesky jungle trolls, of course. 

Soapstones weigh approximately 5oz. Not a licensed product.

Disclaimer: Not responsible for your impending addiction to showering instead of raiding. (Sorry, guildies.) Once you smell the intoxicating awesome of using my Soapstone soap, you won't be able to put it down, either.

name: Superhero GEEKSOAP - Batman vs. Superman, & Batgirl
description: Superhero soaps that really pack a punch! Now you can fight crime and grime at the same time (and that rhymes) with NEW redesigns of my popular Batman (and new Superman) soap designs! These super bars are full-sized, weighing in at just under 6oz/each, and the molds were hand carved with lots of love. Batman connoisseurs will appreciate that the bars come in several color combinations: classic, modern, and "dark knight." Now featuring a fabulous Batgirl color scheme, too! Batman bars smell of Gotham black amber musk, with hints of clove and nutmeg, while Batgirl smells of fresh, spicy ginger peach. Superman bars have a rugged, manly cologne scent that is almost as woo-inducing as that single stray curl. All bars are made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients! Fan made parody designs; not a licensed or endorsed product.

name: Smuggler's Starship GEEKSOAP
description: "She may not look like much, but she's got it where it counts, kid." -Han Solo The fastest hunk of junk in the galaxy can get you clean in less than 12 parsecs! (Or "twelve Standard Time Units.") Made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients with a rugged yet romantic scent, no one will be able to resist this soap's charm. Our son has his very own Millennium Falcon that we built him last year... so you could say that this ship (and soap!) holds a special place in our hearts :)

name: Doctor Who Guest Soap Set
description:
Will you spend your time in the shower traveling through time and space, or exterminate dirt and grime on your quest for world domination and cleanliness? Now you don't have to choose, because this fantastic Doctor Who guest soap set includes one each of the iconic blue police box AND bronzed Dalek! 

Both guest soap bars are 2.5" tall and weigh approximately 3.5oz combined. Their comforting scent of clean laundry will remind you where home is if you get lost in time on your bathing adventures.

I got so many requests to bring back my old Doctor Who soap design that I decided to do one better: offer something new! Thanks for your input, and hope you enjoy!

Made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients. Not a licensed or endorsed product.

name: Turtle Power! GEEKSOAP
description: They're the world's most fearsome fighting team, They're heroes in a soap form and they're green, When the filthy dirt attacks, these turtle boys don't cut it no slack... These hand carved soaps fight crime AND grime & are guaranteed to make you smell less like a sewer and more like a ninja. A totally tubular ninja, of course. Pizza scented, (Yes, I said pizza scented!) made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients. These are now FULL-SIZED soaps, a re-design of my old guest soap size, meaning they are 5 full ounces of turtle power each! Fan creation, not a licensed or endorsed product.

name: Clean Me Up, Scotty! Star Trek GEEKSOAP
description: Boldly go where no man has gone before... in the shower?! Whether you've been fighting the assimilation of the Borg, grappling with the Gorn, or just cuddling tribbles, this soap will ensure you look and smell clean at the end of a hard day. Dear dirt, Resistance is futile. Love, you These insignia soaps weigh 5oz/ea and are refreshing and earthy, with notes of lemon zest, basil, and star jasmine. Just as you'd imagine a new, undiscovered planet would smell like! Made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients, too. Clean me up, Scotty! Not a licensed or endorsed product.

name: Arc Reactor GEEKSOAP
description:
I don't know about you, but I need something epic to power me up in the morning and get me through my day. What's more epic than the ultimate power source that keeps Iron Man going? Introducing Arc Reactor soap! Now you can harness Tony Stark's amazing power in your shower. Hot.

Powered by a sultry unisex black amber musk scent. Hold it up to your chest when you wash for the ultimate experience in awesome.

Two designs to choose from - blue & black or red. Both power sources are equally epic and will start your morning off with the surge you need to make it through a long day.

The mold was custom designed and created by me so you can be sure that your soap is lovingly handmade and one-of-a-kind. You won't find soap like it anywhere else!

Made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients. Not a licensed product.

name: Jawa Soapcrawler GEEKSOAP
description: UTINI! This *IS* the soap you're looking for! With the sunny scent of endless Tatooine sand dunes, this petite 2.5oz Jawa Sandcrawler soap is made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients with tons of TLC and LOADS of detail. Its size is perfect for your guest room sink, or when traveling for those too-important diplomatic missions across the galaxy. Jawas not included.

name: OUTATIME 1.21 Gigawash GEEKSOAP
description: It's time to go back to the future of clean with a full 1.21 gigawashes of pure soap magic! This beautifully bronzed 3.5oz bar of 100% all natural and vegan friendly soap will wash that dirt off with the power only a flux capacitor can disperse, all while smelling of sweet, sweet California sunshine. Warning: Not responsible for actual time travel through the space time continuum and/or any time travel related mishaps that may or may not occur with the use of this soap. Please bathe responsibly. Not a licensed or endorsed product.

name: D20 Soap On A Rope GEEKSOAP
description: Ya, that's what you think it is. As featured on Wizards of the Coast, CRAFTzine & Geekologie and tweeted about as being "amazing, clever & creative" by Wil Wheaton ... D20 dice soap... ON A ROPE?! *head explodes* Yes, this is full of awesome and win you can't get anywhere else. D20 GEEKSOAP On A Rope always scores a critical hit against bad body odor. This large, one-of-a-kind solid soap features 20 sides of cleanliness with a sturdy hand-crocheted cotton rope that makes it convenient to hang in your dungeon... erm, I mean shower! Weighs 4oz. GEEKSOAP is handmade one-at-a-time from all natural and vegan friendly ingredients, and comes generously scented with a crisp, clean fragrance guaranteed to woo the opposite sex. The mold was custom designed and created by me so you can be sure that your soap is lovingly handmade and 100% original. Wil Wheaton owns one... shouldn't you? See all of your color choices here! The AWESOME dice bag you see in the photos are handmade by @GeekyLyndsay over at http://www.dragonchow.com - she makes the most perfect flat-bottom drawstring dice bags in a variety of sizes to suit your personality and all of your dice sets. Be sure to stop by and show her some love and grab a bag or two while you're there. Tell her GEEKSOAP sent you! (And yes, Wil Wheaton is also holding a Dragon Chow dice bag in that photo with my soap, because he owns both and we're AWESOME!)

name: Game of Foams GEEKSOAP
description: When playing the game of foams, you win or you die. Make sure to smell your best no matter where your loyalties lie. STARK Winter is coming... be the one true clean in the north by siding with the Starks. Sigil: Grey wolf on winter white Scent: Betrayal. A crisp combination of pine, cedar, and eucalyptus with just a hint of campfire to capture the essence of the wintry north. LANNISTER Hear me roar and always pay your debts to cleanliness. Sigil: Golden lion on crimson Scent: Pride. A sweet, earthy blend of patchouli, plumeria, and orange; rich and manipulative. TARGARYEN Fire and blood cleanses all. Sigil: Scarlet dragon on pitch black Scent: Dragon's blood. A fiery blend of amber, myrrh, sandalwood, and a hint of patchouli. Powerful enough to wake the dragon. BARATHEON Ours is the clean. Sigil: Black crowned stag on goldenrod Scent: Forest fury. An earthy blend of pine and campfire; strong enough to rule a kingdom. GREYJOY We do not soap. Sigil: Gold kraken on inky black Scent: Ironborn. An aroma of unrelenting ocean waves and sea spray. Don't worry, you won't have to pay the iron price for this soap. TYRELL Cleaning strong. Sigil: Gold rose on a field of green Scent: Highgarden. A bouquet of blossoming roses and delicate musk. Growing up the ranks, rising strong and proud. Not a licensed or endorsed product. Fan interpretation completely hand-carved with love based on George R. R. Martin's series, A Song of Ice and Fire. All bars are roughly 5.5 oz of 100% all natural and vegan friendly soap. Watch seasons 1, 2, and now 3 of Game of Thrones at HBO GO.

name: 8-Bit Game Cartridge GEEKSOAP
description:
Get your game on... in the shower! 

Relive your favorite classic gaming adventures in the tub with the original Game Cartridge soap! This game cartridge soap packs 8-bit power in every shower! Rated "V" for Vegan Friendly.

Bonus: you won't need to blow on these cartridges to get them to work.

GEEKSOAP is handmade one-at-a-time from all natural and vegan friendly ingredients with a refreshing lime mint fragrance.

The molds were custom designed and created by me so you can be sure that your soap is lovingly handmade and 100% one-of-a-kind. These were the first and original game cartridge soap bars on earth! They've been featured all over the Internet and published in gaming magazines. Wil Wheaton even has one, and has autographed a bar for me!

This is 9oz of solid soap through and through - that means the soap versions weigh more than the real thing! Made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients. Not a licensed product.

Note: Yes, that's Wil Wheaton's autograph on my soap. No, Wil Wheaton's autograph is not included with your order. Sorry! ;)

name: 64-Bit Game Cartridge GEEKSOAP
description:
Get your game on... in the shower! 

Relive your favorite classic gaming adventures in the tub with the original Game Cartridge soap! This game cartridge soap packs 64-bit power in every shower! Rated "V" for Vegan Friendly.

Bonus: you won't need to blow on these cartridges to get them to work.

GEEKSOAP is handmade one-at-a-time from all natural and vegan friendly ingredients with a refreshing lime mint fragrance.

The molds were custom designed and created by me so you can be sure that your soap is lovingly handmade and 100% one-of-a-kind. These were the first and original game cartridge soap bars on earth! They've been featured all over the Internet and published in gaming magazines. Wil Wheaton even has one, and has autographed a bar for me!

5oz of solid soap through and through - that means the soap versions weigh more than the real thing! Made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients. Not a licensed product.

name: 16-Bit Game Cartridge GEEKSOAP
description:
Get your game on... in the shower! 

Relive your favorite classic gaming adventures in the tub with the original Game Cartridge soap! This game cartridge soap packs 16-bit power in every shower! Rated "V" for Vegan Friendly.

Bonus: you won't need to blow on these cartridges to get them to work.

GEEKSOAP is handmade one-at-a-time from all natural and vegan friendly ingredients with a refreshing lime mint fragrance.

The molds were custom designed and created by me so you can be sure that your soap is lovingly handmade and 100% one-of-a-kind. These were the first and original game cartridge soap bars on earth! They've been featured all over the Internet and published in gaming magazines. Wil Wheaton even has one, and has autographed a bar for me!

8oz of solid soap through and through - that means the soap versions weigh more than the real thing! Made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients. Not a licensed product.

name: Handheld Game Cartridge Guest Soap GEEKSOAP
description:
Get your game on... in the shower!

The natural complement to 16-Bit, 64-Bit, or 8-Bit Game Cartridge GEEKSOAP, the original Handheld Game Cartridge Guest Soap is the perfect size for travel and guest bathroom sinks, and is just plain awesome. Rated "V" for Vegan Friendly!

Bonus: you won't need to blow on these cartridges to get them to work.

GEEKSOAP is handmade one-at-a-time from all natural and vegan friendly ingredients with a refreshing lime mint fragrance.

The molds were custom designed and created by me so you can be sure that your soap is lovingly handmade and 100% one-of-a-kind. These were the first and original game cartridge soap bars on earth! They've been featured all over the Internet and published in gaming magazines. Wil Wheaton even has one, and has autographed a bar for me!

Approximately 1.5oz of awesome. Made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients. Not a licensed product.

name: Retro 2600 Game Cartridge GEEKSOAP
description:
Get your game on... in the shower! 

Relive your favorite classic gaming adventures in the tub with the original Retro 2600 Game Cartridge soap! This game cartridge GEEKSOAP packs classic gaming power in every shower! Rated "V" for Vegan Friendly.

Bonus: you won't need to blow on these cartridges to get them to work.

GEEKSOAP is handmade one-at-a-time from all natural and vegan friendly ingredients with a sultry unisex black amber musk scent.

The molds were custom designed and created by me so you can be sure that your soap is lovingly handmade and 100% one-of-a-kind. These were the first and original game cartridge soap bars on earth! They've been featured all over the Internet and published in gaming magazines. Wil Wheaton even has one of these exact bars, and has autographed a bar for me!

5oz of solid soap through and through - that means the soap versions weigh more than the real thing! Made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients. Not a licensed product.

name: SG 16-Bit Game Cartridge GEEKSOAP
description:
Get your game on... in the shower! 

Relive your favorite classic gaming adventures in the tub with the original Game Cartridge soap! This game cartridge soap packs 16-bit power in every shower! Rated "V" for Vegan Friendly.

Bonus: you won't need to blow on these cartridges to get them to work.

GEEKSOAP is handmade one-at-a-time from all natural and vegan friendly ingredients with a sultry unisex black amber musk scent.

The molds were custom designed and created by me so you can be sure that your soap is lovingly handmade and 100% one-of-a-kind. These were the first and original game cartridge soap bars on earth! They've been featured all over the Internet and published in gaming magazines. Wil Wheaton even has one, and has autographed a bar for me!

5oz of solid soap through and through - that means the soap versions weigh more than the real thing! Made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients. Not a licensed product.

name: Cthulhu GEEKSOAP
description:
Because even The Old One has to bathe sometime... geek tested, Elder God approved. A GEEKSOAP original!

Made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients! Weighing in at around 5oz, this soap smells of masculine musk and awesome.

Disclaimer: Not responsible for brain suckage that may occur if you allow the tentacles to get too close to your head while bathing.

name: POW! Comic Book GEEKSOAP
description: POW! Deal dirt and grime an explosive blow with this fantastically comic booked soap! You'll love its powerful scent combination of marine, rich cedarwood & musk. Because who hasn't wondered what onomatopoeia smells like? Made of 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients. This soap was inspired by and made in conjunction with our kid's weekly webcomic over at GeeklingComic.com! Be sure to check out the adventures of our geekling and his schnauzer.

name: Heart Emoticon GEEKSOAP
description: Roses are #FF0000 Violets are #0000FF This geeky soap means I less than three you! Ahhh less than 3. The universally geeky emoticon for love. Spread the love (or maybe send a subtle hint to the one you love) with Heart Emoticon GEEKSOAP! Scented sweet brown sugar and weighs approximately 5oz. Made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients.

name: Zelda Triforce GEEKSOAP
description: "It can only be called fate... That here, I would again gather the three with the crests... That I should lay my hand on that which grants the wishes of the beholder. That when power, wisdom, and courage come together, the gods would have no choice but to come down... The power of the gods... The Triforce! He who touches it will have whatever he desires granted!" -Ganondorf Take the golden sacred triangles of the Legend of Zelda Triforce (Power, Wisdom, and Courage) with you in the shower and may all your wishes come true. Made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients smelling of crisp, clean cucumber melon and weighing in at around 5oz. Not a licensed or endorsed product.

name: Clean of Kong GEEKSOAP
description: Introducing another GEEKSOAP original! Clean of Kong: A Fistful of Bubbles! Donkey Kong is one of the legendary classics in the video game world. Forget Billy Mitchell or Steve Wiebe... now YOU can beat the record high score for cleanliness and go down in history forever as the Clean of Kong! This fabulous soap is an iconic homage to an arcade classic, based on the token barrels found throughout the entire game series. It was custom designed and created by me, so you can be sure your soap is lovingly handmade and one-of-a-kind! These unique barrel shaped soaps stand approximately 2.75" tall and are nearly 3" across at their widest point, weighing in at a whopping 7 oz each! They smell of plump banana bunches with a hint of sweet coconut, and you'll love that every bar is made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients.

name: Guild Wars 2 Karma GEEKSOAP
description:
Tyria's currency for the best armor and weapons can now upgrade your cleanliness to an epic level as well! 

Envelop yourself in an aura of lavender and orange with delicate hints of pine and cashmere. Karma soap will ensure you're legendary in the shower AND on the battlefield.

Made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients.

name: Dragon Warrior Slime GEEKSOAP
description: A Slime draws near! Command? * FIGHT * SPELL * RUN * BATHE Choose from blue, red, green, or metal to fight off the slime and grime of daily adventuring. 100% all natural, vegan friendly soap in four powerful scents to make questing a whole lot more enjoyable. Each bar weighs approximately 5oz. I hand paint each smiling face with all natural soap, too! Not a licensed or endorsed product; soap is completely hand carved, painted, and fan made out of love for the best NES game ever. Goes great with my line of game cartridge soaps, too!

name: Platform Nine and Three Quarters GEEKSOAP
description:
ALL ABOARD!

Your adventure begins here, young witches and wizards! A whole lot of awesome is departing from Platform Nine and Three Quarters.

Scented Pumpkin Juice and weighing in at around 4.5 oz, this 100% all natural and vegan friendly soap is pure magic.

name: Hockey Geek Regulation Puck GEEKSOAP
description: "Oh! The good old hockey game, Is the best game you can name; And the best game you can name, Is the good old hockey game!" HOCKEY'S BACK, BABY! Let's celebrate! This solid soap has official hockey puck regulation dimensions and weighs approximately 4.2oz. It's vegan friendly and made from 100% all natural ingredients! The perfect way to get your little (or big) hockey fan to enjoy the bath. Scented mint chocolate chip.

name: Mystery Block GEEKSOAP
description:
You never know what's in store when you break a mystery block, but it almost always equals something good to give you a boost just when you need it most. Now you can take that super boost with you in the shower with Mystery Block soap.  Jump start your day with an advantage over the baddies!

Handmade one-at-a-time from all natural and vegan friendly ingredients, these bars are generously scented with a delicious aroma reminiscent of oatmeal, milk & honey.

The molds were custom designed and created by me so you can be sure that your soap is lovingly handmade and 100% one-of-a-kind. You won't find soap like it anywhere else!

Bars weigh 6oz/each. Made from 100% vegan friendly and all natural ingredients. Not a licensed product.

name: Binary Massage GEEKSOAP
description: There are 10 types of people in this world: those that understand binary and the importance of a good, massaging bar of soap… and those that don’t. Finally, the one and only soap in the true language of geek. The Binary bar GEEKSOAP mold was custom designed and created by me so you can be sure that your soap is lovingly handmade and 100% one-of-a-kind. The unique raised 1s and 0s are perfect for massaging away the stresses of the day, geek style. Binary bars weigh 5.5oz and come in four varieties: SOLID COLOR The colored Binary GEEKSOAP bars come in a color of your choice, available to specify upon checkout. Choose from lemon, peach, pink, blue, lime, lilac, seafoam, solid black, or grey. Scent: Fresh laundry. HONEY AND OATMEAL The powerful combination of the honey and oatmeal layers packs acne-fighting power, moisturization, and itch relief together in one amazingly geeky bar of soap. Scent: Natural honey & oatmeal OATMEAL COFFEE SCRUB The addition of fine grind coffee in the rich and luxurious oatmeal base provides a gentle scrubbing property to a bar which already provides skin moisturization and itch relief. Contains real fine grind coffee that's a great exfoliant. Scent: Natural oatmeal & coffee. LEMON POPPYSEED SCRUB This refreshing lemon scented bar is heavenly. It features real poppyseeds, which adds a gentle exfoliating property to this soothing bar. Scent: Lemon Made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly (minus the honey oatmeal bar, depending on your views) ingredients.

name: Slice of Pi GEEKSOAP
description:
Fresh from the oven for the math geek in you… pi soap! MORE THAN 3.14159 ounces of good, clean fun. Available in four “flavors” … apple pie (green), cherry pie (pink), pumpkin pie (orange), or lemon meringue pie (yellow)! YUM!

Made from 5oz of 100% vegan friendly and all natural ingredients.

name: Mustache GEEKSOAP
description:
Smell great when you're going incognito in the bath, because it doesn't get much cooler than your soap sporting a 'stache. One of the oldest and most popular soaps in the GEEKSOAP line!

Made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients. Smells of manly aftershave and weighs approximately 6oz. Awesome!

name: All Aboard the GEEKSOAP Train! Soap Trains
description: All aboard the GEEKSOAP train! Full steam ahead to cleanliness and adventure in the bath with these fabulous soap engines. Kid tested, parent approved; kids love the fun shape and parents love that each solid soap train is made from 100% all natural and vegan friendly ingredients. Win-win! With three colors to choose from, (And an additional Thomas-inspired color scheme, too!) your kids will be excited about bath night. Soap trains smell crisp and fresh like the ocean, with notes of sea spray and beach daisies and weigh approximately 4.5oz. Additional train cars coming soon! Looking for the Harry Potter soap train? Looking for the Valentine's Day soap train?
